statements: SELECT * FROM natural_disasters_areas;
SELECT disaster_type, location FROM natural_disasters_areas WHERE disaster_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM natural_disasters_areas ORDER BY disaster_date DESC;
SELECT disaster_type, COUNT(*) FROM natural_disasters_areas GROUP BY disaster_type;
SELECT disaster_id, disaster_type, location.ST_Y() AS latitude, location.ST_X() AS longitude FROM natural_disasters_areas WHERE disaster_type = 'Earthquake';
SELECT disaster_id, disaster_type, location, disaster_date FROM natural_disasters_areas ORDER BY disaster_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM natural_disasters_areas WHERE disaster_type = 'Flood' ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT disaster_id, disaster_type, location FROM natural_disasters_areas WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location, 'POINT(0 0)') < 10000
SELECT disaster_date, disaster_type FROM natural_disasters_areas WHERE disaster_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT disaster_type, COUNT(*) FROM natural_disasters_areas GROUP BY disaster_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_name, upload_date FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM satellite_images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM disaster_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_id, ST_AsText(area_geometry) FROM disaster_areas WHERE area_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM satellite_images;
SELECT image_name, upload_date FROM satellite_images WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT area_name, ST_AsText(area_geometry) FROM disaster_areas WHERE ST_Area(area_geometry) > 1000;
SELECT image_name, area_name FROM satellite_images LEFT JOIN disaster_areas ON satellite_images.image_id = disaster_areas.affected_image_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_images, AVG(ST_Area(area_geometry)) AS avg_area FROM satellite_images INNER JOIN disaster_areas ON satellite_images.image_id = disaster_areas.affected_image_id;
SELECT * FROM natural_disaster_areas;
SELECT area_name, disaster_type FROM natural_disaster_areas WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM disaster_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(team_capacity) AS max_capacity FROM rescue_teams;
SELECT area_name, disaster_type, timestamp FROM natural_disaster_areas WHERE disaster_type = 'earthquake';
SELECT area_name, disaster_type, timestamp FROM natural_disaster_areas;
SELECT report_date, report_description FROM disaster_reports WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, deployed_date, team_capacity FROM rescue_teams ORDER BY deployed_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, ST_AsText(affected_region) FROM natural_disaster_areas WHERE disaster_type = 'Earthquake';
SELECT * FROM disaster_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM areas_affected;
SELECT area_name, longitude, latitude FROM areas_affected WHERE disaster_type = 'earthquake';
SELECT id, image_url, captured_date FROM satellite_images ORDER BY captured_date DESC;
SELECT type_name FROM disaster_types WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_id, analyzed_date, analyzed_by FROM image_analysis WHERE area_id = 2 ORDER BY analyzed_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM areas_affected ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM areas_affected WHERE disaster_type = 'Earthquake';
SELECT image_url, captured_date FROM satellite_images WHERE captured_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT area_name, longitude, latitude, disaster_type FROM areas_affected WHERE disaster_type IN ('Flood', 'Fire') ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT type_name, COUNT(*) FROM disaster_types GROUP BY type_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteImages;
SELECT image_id, image_path, image_date FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_id = '12345';
SELECT image_id, image_path, image_date, image_capture_time FROM SatelliteImages WHERE image_capture_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT area_name, area_polygon FROM AffectedAreas WHERE area_name LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT disaster_name, disaster_date FROM NaturalDisasters ORDER BY disaster_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT disaster_name, disaster_date FROM NaturalDisasters WHERE disaster_type = 'Earthquake';
SELECT image_id, image_path, image_date FROM SatelliteImages ORDER BY image_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, ST_AsText(area_polygon) FROM AffectedAreas WHERE ST_Area(area_polygon) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM DisasterReports JOIN NaturalDisasters ON DisasterReports.disaster_id = NaturalDisasters.disaster_id WHERE disaster_type = 'Flood' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
